message: I think this is a fair offer, considering I'm the one making the proposal first. Let's get this over with!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a larger share than your first proposal gave me.  This seems fair.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a larger share than your last offer. Let's split it more evenly this time.
Alice, this is a compromise - closer to the middle ground.  Take it or leave it - I won't offer more.
